subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee Brewers are working on a deal with the free-agent reliever Eric Gagné, potentially giving the team another option at closer after losing Francisco Cordero to free agency. The Milwaukee Journal-Sentinel reported on its Web site that Gagné has a deal in place with the Brewers, pending a physical. The Brewers were interested in Gagné before last season’s trading deadline but lost out to the Red Sox. Gagné struggled in Boston, going 2-2 with a 6.75 earned run average.
